DOC.brief_summary: This safety surveillance study conduct accordance Korea Food Drug Administration ( KFDA ) Notification No . 2009-46 `` Basic standard reexamination new drug '' . The study objective ass within 30 day post-administration , safety ADACEL™ administer real clinical practice .
